buildCommand: cd ../.. && npm install && npm run build --workspace=@contentful-landing-page-builder/contentful-app

headers.value: default-src 'self' https://app.contentful.com https://api.contentful.com https://images.ctfassets.net; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://images.ctfassets.net https://picsum.photos https://placehold.co https://fastly.picsum.photos https://placeholder.com https://dummyimage.com; connect-src 'self' https://api.contentful.com https://app.contentful.com https://YOUR_LANDING_PAGES_DOMAIN.vercel.app;
